title: LLM predictions for 2026, shared with Oxide and Friends
description: Simon Willison shares his annual LLM predictions for 2026 as part of the Oxide and Friends podcast tradition, covering trends and expectations for the coming year in language models.
author: Simon Willison

title: Cursor Changelog: CLI features and performance improvements
description: Cursor AI code editor releases new CLI controls for models, MCP (Model Context Protocol) management, rules and commands functionality, and major hooks performance improvements.
author: Cursor Team

title: Fragments: January 8 - Human Decisions in Reviewing LLM Outputs
description: Martin Fowler discusses what decisions humans make when reviewing LLM outputs and what corrections they make.
author: Martin Fowler

title: Understanding Specification-Driven Code Generation with LLMs
description: Research analyzing how human intervention in specification and test refinement influences the quality and dynamics of LLM-generated code.
author: Researchers

title: He was called a 'terrorist sympathizer.' Now his AI company is valued at $3B
description: Article about Replit founder Amjad Masad and the company's $3B valuation, discussing the growth of AI-powered development tools.
author: SF Standard

title: Best AI Coding Tools for Developers in 2026
description: Comprehensive guide on AI coding tools that scale from solo workflows to teams while maintaining code quality and trust.
author: Builder.io

title: Quantifying AI-Friendliness with Code Health Metrics
description: Investigation of 'AI-friendly code' through LLM-based refactoring on a dataset of 5,000 Python files from competitive programming contexts.
author: Researchers

title: AI Coding Assistants Are Getting Worse
description: IEEE Spectrum reports that AI coding assistants are getting worse, with newer models creating 'silent failures' that lead to undetected errors.
author: IEEE Spectrum

title: 12 AI Coding Emerging Trends That Will Dominate 2026
description: Analysis of emerging AI coding trends for 2026, including security-first AI code generation, AI coding maturity models, and focus on measuring real impact and ROI of AI coding tools.
author: AI Software Engineer

title: My LLM coding workflow going into 2026
description: Addy Osmani discusses his LLM coding workflow, emphasizing starting with clear specs before coding, breaking work into iterative chunks, and providing extensive context to LLMs.
author: Addy Osmani

title: Survey Sees Wider Adoption of AI Coding Tools Creating More DevOps Challenges
description: Survey results showing 72% of developers now use AI coding tools daily, with AI tools generating 42% of code in development workflows, but trust issues persist.
author: DevOps.com

title: Repository-Level Code Generation via Context Inlining
description: Novel approach combining draft completion with upstream and downstream perspectives to provide LLMs with a comprehensive repository view for better code generation.
author: C. Hu et al.
